about_the_game:
It's mischief night at Billy’s haunted mansion, and the host has quite the challenge in mind for all the monstrous guests! Partake in a hide-and-seek competition with an original twist: you don't know who you are, and the only place to hide is within the crowd. Can you find yourself in the sea of monsters and prove you’re the sneakiest, most perceptive player of all?

Key Features

  • Intuitive Multiplayer Gameplay : Jump into an easy to learn, yet hard to master hide-and-seek experience where discovering your own identity is just as crucial as uncovering your opponents.

  • Diverse Game Modes : Enjoy a variety of game modes, whether you prefer team-based or competitive challenges, each with its own set of roles and objectives.

  • Flexible Play Options : Play locally or online with 2 to 8 players, offering endless fun whether you’re hosting a party or joining one.

Discreetly figure out who you are, complete your objectives, and seek out other players—all while staying in character and avoiding detection.

Each game mode features unique roles with specific objectives. In this demo, you'll experience Heist mode, where Thieves must stealthily steal all the coins, staying hidden in the dark so their deeds go unnoticed, while Hunters try to catch them before time runs out or all the coins are gone.

Where is Billy? is for 2 to 8 players, either locally or online. Easily connect to other lobbies or open your own to fill up the party and keep the fun going through the matchmaking system.

short_description: Where is Billy? is a hide-and-seek party game for 2-8 players playable locally and online. Figure out which character you are and blend into the crowd to complete various objectives across multiple game modes. Act natural, avoid detection, and outsmart your opponents!
